page.title: 20PHENOMENON OF OSSINGTON !
page.content:
A legend of a woman named{Peggy {Hooper}is told around these parts. It is said that she was brutally murdered over 100 years ago. The tale is that her{ghost}appears to anyone travelling over{Bollenbeck Bridge}at midnight. Unfortunately the authors of this piece were unable to find anyone who has seen this{apparition,}but nevertheless, if cycling in the area at the specified time a rider will always pedal much{faster!}
{CREDITS} The compilation of this piece of work was undertaken by{Norwell Womens {Institute.}The ladies who acquired this information were{Mrs. J. Buswell, {Mrs. M. Wells, Mrs. J. Longden, Mrs. {R. Brown}and{Mrs. I. James.}Slides supplied by{Mrs. I. James, Miss M. {Wilson}and{Mr. P. Ayling.
